posts.post_content:
I had started an Evers back run and decided to go in a different direction.  Below is an Evers cards from that run.  First I'll take it supersedes any on-going negotiations.  


Evers with Bat - Chicago - Raw - Sweet Cap 350/25 = $SOLD

According to the PSA pop report, there are only 11 of the Sweet Cap 350/25 cards graded.  

All prices assume PayPal FF and includes shipping.

Please email me at [url]frankbev29@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions.
Update for cards sold and price drop on remaining card
